purpose: Theory Comprehension & Reduction Layer template. This file is a non-evaluative scaffold only; it does not test, rank, or validate any theory.

theory_corpus.description: Pointers to the theory as a closed unit (papers, notes, axioms, definitions). No interpretation is performed here.

allowed_context.notes: Optional context that does not change the theory content (historical notes, glossary).

claim_units.notes: If requires_full_theory=true, this claim cannot be extracted without distortion; it must be reduced before Phase-4 testing.

observable_mapping_candidates.notes: If constraints_only=true, the output is an observational constraint rather than a direct measurable prediction.

provenance.notes: This TCP template is Phase-4 scaffolding only and introduces no scientific results.
